data.message: Eminem you are the only rapper and singer as I hear. I also think that you are the best rapper in the world, and I do not care what others say or think that you are not a good rapper so they do not know what music is 😍😘👄😗💿🎵🎶🎼🎤🎧

replies.message:
Best of all time, Eminem.
Best of right now, Yelawolf.
Shady Records FTW!

Look, I'm going to say this you don't like him fuck off. We do not want your opinion on how you don't like him. We like him and we believe that he is the best rapper alive, so fuck off back to your shitty artists whilst we enjoy are inspiration Eminem
